title: Mgt Resources-Tech Firms
description: This course explores the competitive advantage manufacturing and service firms derive from effective management of their technology, innovation, workforce, materials, and information resources as driven by uncertainty, global competition, and dynamic markets. Crosslisted with ISYE 6772.
